66666

This suffers from the opposite the two games before it did, the game play is more fun then the first but the story is 'meh'. The world is very beautiful and the sky rails are very fun to hang on to and attack from. And the enemies and guns are interesting at first, but this is ruined by you only being allowed to carry two at any given time. I find myself only sticking to the shotgun and sniper rifle, making all the other choices void. And unfortunately the thing that makes the Bio-shock games unique, the vigors, is better off unused in this game as shooting enemies in the head is far more efficient.

 And the tough characters you would use them on are mostly resistant to the effects. The story is confusing, convoluted, and hard to follow. I wouldn't say it's a bad story, as I don't fully understand it myself, but it's very difficult to follow getting into the game.
Una de mis sagas de videojuegos favoritos, una trilogía perfecta, Bioshock Infinite es un cierre perfecto.
I prefer the first 2 games but i still love it
si

This game was so much work and such beautiful design top to bottom. So much repsect to the developers and artist. Levels, characters, costume, the vigor effects, the misc. conversations you hear between citizens... The game is incredible. That said, the plot makes no sense and the game play is frustrating and repetitive. Most of the game just feels like moving from arena to arena fighting off a horde of enemies. Kill the enemies, unlock the next arena. The motivation and backstory of the Vox is... so lazy. 

This game was clearly a ton of work, and incredible display of talent and vision. I was completely freaking out just walking around and listening to people, listening to journals, looking across the city. It's too bad the half-baked plot and tedious combat demands so much attention from the player.

又一部听说是神作但游玩后体验一般的作品……
天空之城、海底之城、梦幻巴黎三个开头非常惊艳震撼，但后续体验会慢慢下降，游戏性一般（尤其是海葬二，如果没有前作情怀加成，整体感觉会很糟糕，间接削弱了故事的结局表达，这个体验是致命的。）
或许这个故事的设定很有创意，但并不是我喜欢的那种类型，表达方式也不并为我乐意接受。而且游玩过程中遇到bug的次数很频繁，常常要重启进程或者返回检查点才能继续，非常影响体验。
但伊丽莎白真的是我玩游戏至今遇到过最好的队友AI，两个人的互动也是我遇到过最好的设计。给评价的话，大概是个中评。

[h1] Do I recommend Bioshock Infinite? [/h1]

Never mind anyone's stance on whether or not the original Bioshock, Bioshock 2, or Bioshock Infinite was the superior of the series, the games are all individually great. The Bioshock series offered me the greatest gaming experiences I've had thus far. By any means, do try Bioshock Infinite. Regardless of your interest in the rest of the series, this game on its own is a work of art. You will not regret diving deep into the world of Bioshock whichever game you choose to try out yourself. They all come with their charm and Infinite does not let you down with it. Try out Infinite.

[h1] What was Bioshock Infinite like for me? [/h1]

I appreciated the game's story. Some may find it confusing, but I found it to be interesting and compelling. While it seemed to fall short early on, the more you stick around the more you get rewarded. I do appreciate the philosophical aspects of the game. Infinite, as well as the rest of the series, did a fine job standing out with their symbolism, philosophy, and Easter eggs. The ending itself makes all you've experienced have a whole different meaning. The story is the strongest point of the game by far.

The core mechanics are good. The fighting fluid and at some parts exciting with each new element you're introduced to. I am a big fan of making use of the environment in combat and this game offers a lot of ways for you to experience different styles of combat. The skyline on itself and the tears mechanic adds so much more to fighting than I expected initially. I adore how significantly combat has improved across the series.

It is one of a kind. A floating city during the 1900s, Columbia is just as unique and complex as Rapture. Seemingly a Utopia, the city presents its values and underlying philosophy. It presents goodness and righteousness, a place that is meant to shelter the pure from the sins of the world below. The amount of detail and work put into creating a world so beautiful to get immersed into, only for you to discover all its flaws and secrets, is a brilliant concept. They did not disappoint when it came to world-building.

One of my favorite aspects is the connection to the rest of the series. While initially, you find little similarities, you sense a greater connection as the game goes on. Be it the lighthouse we venture into as the game starts, or similarities between Vigors and Plasmids the game keeps bringing your mind back to where it all started, the original Bioshock. As you reach the game's ending, it all rushes back to you, flooding your heart with joy.

[spoiler] "There is always a lighthouse, there's always a man, there's always a city." [/spoiler]
it's a super gaming experience
god tier
el mejor juego que te rompe la cabeza amigo 10/10
Always will be the best.

For being a game from 2013 this game is amazing, if you want a great story with some fighting involved i 100% know that you will love this game. Also everything look's gorgeous. You can also run it on a potato which is always nice.
I'm just going to go ahead and say it, but this is undeniably one of the greatest story-rich games I have ever played, and trust me, I have played many, many games in my eight years of gaming.

The worst part about this game is that it ends.

The world is so beautifully crafted and is designed in a way that communicates and delivers the story exquisitely, the setting they went for, in heavy contrast but also heavily paralleling the first two games creates a sense of endless liberty and constraint at the same time, which says a lot about the story, it's character and the people that populate it.

The story is well told, with twists in all the right places and enough to have you questioning everything that's going on, I would absolutely recommend anyone who is interested in a good tale, whether or not they are an old Bioshock player or not, to take up this game.
master piece

Another amazing Bioshock title that you definitely need to play if you havent.

+Environment is different than previous titles but still its uniqe and tasty
+Using unreal engine 3, graphics are pretty nice for its year. Also you can customize almost everything via config notepad. Check pcgamingwiki website in order to disable depth of field and fix some ui features
+had 0 crash, some areas have fps drops but its not disturbing that much
+Story is amazing too, like any other bioshock titles
+Game lenght is super long, its like never ending. Bunch of story elements and collectibles. Took 25 hours on hard for me (plus i havent died) tried to explore everywhere though.
+Guns and vigors(plasmids from previous ones) perfectly fine and numerious
+3 great DLCs
+nice achievements
+Voices and sountracks. Voice actors did amazing job
+sky hooks are something different and adds ultra enjoyful gameplay dynamism
+co-op game design inside of "singleplayer" title. Not even gonna talk about it
+looting
+easy to master

Unfortunately
-Game is so easy overall
-gunfight and looting not balanced
-enemies are appearing step by step
-some removals from introduce stage
-there is no lack of ammunation tension

I highy recommend check pcgamingwiki before you play. Huge discounts coming everytime. Bioshock should add more legends in its story.

I was a huge fan of Bioshock 1 and 2, but this is just horrible. The combat is boring and is just like any other shitty shooter on the market. The mechanics fail in almost every way to the point where dying is the smartest thing you can do. I played through this on hard mode, constantly just running into fights, using up all my ammo and then dying, only to find that i now had ammo, and was able to beat the fight. The enemies are boring and generic with absolutely nothing unique about them. Money is useless, and the limit of 2 weapons at a time neuters any and all tactic or thinking within combat. 
Now, all of this i could forgive. The combat is the epitome of the phrase "dog ass", but if a game has a good story, I could care less if the gameplay was worse than Sonic Forces, but if the story is worthwhile, I'll be happy. 
However, the story is ABSOLUTELY NOT worthwhile, or good in any sense of the word. Coming off of the first 2 
Bioshock games, its very easy to notice the drop in writing quality. Where the first game had complex themes, and a narrative that unfolded over the terrifying hours of exploring rapture, we now have literally, LITERALLY the moral complexity of "racism bad". Now, I have no problem with media exploring racism and such disgusting bigotry as a topic, in fact its one of the most interesting topics I've seen explored. But this game does it worse than anything  else I've seen before. (Maybe putting aside Detroit: Become Human, but at least that game had some pretty well written parts) The game constantly shoves it's half-assed themes down your throat from the very moment you enter the city. Now, very poor social commentary put aside, the rest of the story is somehow worse. 
From the beyond irritating Elizabeth, to the stupid and boring villain. From the beyond generic protagonist, who's a carbon copy of every milquetoast white dude with a shady past, to the stupid, convoluted ending that leaves you confused, not in the sense that you don't understand it (because it's actually quite simple, despite what the angry 2000 IQ fanboys will have you think), but confused at the fact that someone likely got paid to write this, and they were probably really proud of it. The themes are stupid with the game amounting to a moral of "nothing you do matters". If it was done well, if the idea of your choices all leading to the same place was executed well, I would have loved it. What an amazing and interesting idea for a video game. (it may sound like I'm being sarcastic, but in a medium defined by player choice, having a game with that idea sounds very interesting to me. IF it is done well.) But the game simply does not convey that very well. It's abundantly clear that absolutely nothing you do has any meaning within the game, but then they act as if its a big reveal that you didn't have any real choice. 
Now I'm just gonna say, Elizabeth is the most fucking annoying character ever. She is constantly saying some stupid shit, blocking you from areas because of her terrible inclusion into the gameplay mechanics, or just all around being the most annoying companion since the companions of Skyrim. Her character "arc" is cliche, uninteresting and just plain boring. 
All in all, this game ends up being a generic shooter, with very poor mechanics, and an even worse story, that fails to even scratch the surface of how great the first game was, and the second to a lesser extent. If you're goal is to play all of the Bioshock games, just skip past this game, for your own sake, and if you want to play a shooter, or a story rich game, there are a million other games that do everything this does better. I'm truly at a loss as to how this game got good reviews.
TL;DR - The gameplay sucks, the story is terrible, there's truly no reason to play this game, especially not if you're a fan of the other Bioshock games. 

And if you haven't played the other Bioshocks, just go play them instead

elizabeth aşırı iyi bir yan karakter, oyunun dünyası çok güzel oyunla ilgili olumlu olan özellikler sadece bunlar. kesinlikle bu puanı hakeden bir oyun değil aşırı şişirilmiş oyunun sondaki plot twisti güzel ama oraya gelene kadar size bir bok anlatmadığı için sondada he öyleymiş demek diye bakıyosunuz ekrana ve oyun bitiyor zaten. hikaye anlatımı diye bir şey yok yani rezalettt kesinlikle. olay bir hikayenin sizin ağzınıza kaşıkla verilmemesi değil önemli olan onu merak ettirmek,öyle bir anlatırsın ki oyunu kapatıp araştırma yapar oyunda gördüklerinin üzerine yeni bilgilerle tatmin olursun. ama bu oyun öyle bir oyun ki oyunda sadece bölüm bölüm botlara sıkıp bik bik bir şeyler izliyosunuz, anlatmaya çalışmak sizi araştırmaya teşvik etmek falan sıfır. eğer hikayeli oyun seviyorsanız ve sırf hikayesi yüzünden çok övüldüğünü duyup alıp oynayacaksanız büyük bir hayal kırıklığına uğrayacaksınız çünkü hikayesi sizi bağlamazsa oyunda oynanış diye bir şey yok. hikayesini merak ediyosanız da açın bir youtube videosu veya wiki sayfasını hem oyunu oynadığınızda anlayacağınız (!) hikayeyi daha iyi anlarsınız hemde kafanızda daha anlaşılır ve iyi bir hikaye olarak kalır en azından.

바이오쇼크 인피니트 컨텐츠 해볼거 다해보고 리뷰를 기록합니다.
->바이오쇼크 시리즈 모두 플레이를 했습니다. 1,2,3 모두 숨겨진 컨텐츠 방[아레나 슈터방] , 박물관에 숨겨진 그림과 영상 열기 뷔페에서 맛있는 음식을 가득먹을수 있는 기회를 많이 만들어 볼려고 노력을 많이 했습니다. 
게임을 플레이하면서 난이도를 적절하게 조절을 하면서 게임을 했습니다. 

-게임플레이 소감-
메인 게임 스토리 [1회차] [2회차] [보통 난이도],[어려움 난이도] 플레이를 하면서 느낀건 난이도가 올라가야 FPS게임을 재미있게 플레이를 할수있는 기회를 만들수 있었습니다. 
스토리를 두번이나 연속으로 봤는데 새로운 도전과제를 완료도 할수있는 찬스도 만들수 있었습니다.

[왠만하면 스토리는 1번 엔딩하면 끝인데 바이오쇼크 게임은 한번에 끝내기가 아쉬움 즉 더 플레이하고 바이오쇼크 게임에 관심을 가질수있게 게임을 만드신 제작자 분이 유저들에게 재미있는 컨텐츠를 게임속에 많이 만들어 놓아서 게임플레이 하면서 지루하다는 생각은 해본적이 없는것 같다.
아레나 슈터 방은 바이오쇼크 인피니트에 매력 포인트 컨텐츠 입니다. 스트레스,짜증,심심함 을 모두 잡아주는 컨텐츠  아레나 슈터 방이기도 하죠. 매력이 엄청나게 뿜뿜 ^^ 준비된 사나이도 아닌 초보자도 쉽게 놀수있는 전쟁놀이터 입니다.^^

게임을 하면서 게임패드로 총을 이리저리 쏘다가 채력이 부족한 상태에서 도망가다가 갑자기 튀어나온 적에게 죽임을 당하고 적이 쏜 총에 쓰쳐서 죽임도 당하고 , 몽둥이로 찜질을 당해서 죽임을 당하고 으...으 너무 무서웠음
여러번 체크포인트 다시 시작도 하는 재미도 있더군요.[짜증좀 났음 돈 없고 탄약 없을때]

아네라 슈터 방에 있는 보스 핸디맨은 꿈에도 나올 것 같은 무서운 괴물 캐릭터 입니다.핸디맨은 만나면 도망이 아닌 두들겨 패주자.

바이오쇼크 인피니트 게임을 하면서 컴럼비아 공중도시를 여행을 하면서 스카이라인으로 적을 잡고 플라스미드 스킬을 이용해서 적을 가지고 놀기도 하고 ^^ 문어 아이템 날리는 아이템 이거 아레나 슈터방에서 유용하게 쓰입니다.

-문어 그림 아이템--> 적을 끌어당기고 놓고 업그레이드 해주면 적을 공중으로 날릴수 있고 적이 비행선에 5명이 모여있다면 문어를 발사 0_0 그럼 빠이빠이 임.

바이오쇼크 인피니트에 숨겨진 재미있는 요소
1.숨겨진 코드를 찾아서 비밀의 방 문열기 2.녹음기 찾기[먼소리인지 모르겠지만 다 찾음] 3.무기를 업그레이드 4.스킬을 업그레이트 5.바닥에 유리를 밝브면 진짜 유리를 밝는느낌[헤드셋을 쓰면 귀가 찌릿함]+배경음악[OST] 게임을 하면서 힐링할수 있는 음악도 많이있고 첫번째에 등대를 지나고 교회 건물에 진입을 했을때 아름다운 음악소리가 오래도록 기역이 남는다.

6.물소리와 물 그래픽이 유저의 마음과 호기심을 잡아준다. 바다속에서 일어난 일이아닌 하늘에서 일어나는 일이기게 궁금하고 더 호기심이 간다. NPC가 편하게 대화를 하는 장면 부커와 엘리자베스가 농담도 하는 장면 화가나면 인정사정 볼것 없다는 게임 챕터도 있더군요, 잠자는 유령과 한판승부 으...ㅇ

7.게임 난이도가 다양해서 유저들의 취향에 맞게 선택해서 플레이를 할수있다.[보통,어려움,초고난이도1999모드]
저는 어려움 난이도까지 플레이를 만족합니다. 게임을 플레이할때 FPS게임을 쉽게 접한 유저라면 보통난이도를 추천 합니다. 보통 난이도 해결후에 어려움 선택하시는 것을 추천 합니다.

8.도전과제 획득하면 이쁜 아이콘 모양으로 나와서 라이브러리 더 이뻐지는것 같습니다.
게임플레이 하면서 도전과제가 다양하게 있었다는 것도 인피니트 게임플레이를 하면서 하나하나 알게되었고 획득을 했다. 손에 땀나고 배고프고 도전과제는 해보는데까지 하면 끝 ^^

------------------바이오쇼크 인피니트 게임 FPS게임을 접하면서 오래도록 게임을 할수있었던 부분인것 같습니다.
[그래픽 100점] [게임소리100점] [최적화 100점] 게임에서 즐길수있는 다양한 컨텐츠 10000점 엄청나게 다양해서 게임을 플레이하면서 이 방법 저 방법 다 동원을 해야 클리어를 할수있는 부분도 있더군요.
순수 플레이를 하면서 유튜브 공략도 보면서 게임을 하니까 인피니티 게임을 하면서 공부도 많이 한것 같네요.

Sinceramente, no soy mucho de dar reseñas de juegos. Pero este en especial, necesita uno. Es uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado desde hace 10 años, nunca me he enganchado a un juego ya sea por la trama, jugabilidad o graficos.
Columbia se siente viva... sus filtros de colores es perfecto, su historia totalmente inmersiva y chocante (sobre todo al final). Su jugabilidad bastante fluida, y los paisajes que presentan a lo largo del juego... son maravillosos.
La forma en que la trama se conecta con los juegos previos, es bastante buena y resumida. Quede con tantas ganas de saber más sobre la historia que incluso, despues de terminar los DLC's y demas, tuve que ver videos sobre la saga Bioshock por que me he quedado impresionado de tal juego.
Los DLC's no tienen desperdicio, explican bastante sobre la saga, y lo que no me esperaba... Es volver a Rapture.
Como he dicho, es una experiencia totalmente inmersiva, literalmente, sientes que estas en Columbia. Cada personaje, las músicas, las casas y la ambientación... Es increible como lograron tal cosa.
Con respecto a uno de los personajes mas importantes de la historia, Elizabeth. Es sin lugar a dudas el personaje más carismatico y vivo de todos los juegos que he jugado. Su desarrollo a traves de la trama esta muy bien pulido, e incluso llega a ser útil.
Y la historia... es maravillosa, no sabes por donde empezar a unir cada pieza para lograr entenderla, pero una vez que lo logras. Sientes que todo conecta y empieza a cobrar sentido. Una narrativa espectacular.

Lo único negativo que tengo que decir, es que el episodio 1 de Burial At Sea, es bastante corto para mi gusto. Pero el resto es perfecto.

Es totalmente recomendable, pero te recomiendo comprar Bioshock: The Collection. Asi podras enteder toda la saga y como conecta con este juego junto con los DLC's. Y aparte podras ahorrar un par de billetes.

Когда-то давно проходила её на пиратке и тут совсем недавно была акция, которая просто не могла пройти мимо меня. Купив пак с другими частями я осталась довольна. Это игра просто чудо, как и остальные части биошока, но это самая чудесная по сравнению с другими. Красивая картинка которая будет на слабом пк, отличный сюжет где показывают неравенство общество и расизм, механики боя да и многое другое. Можно часами говорить почему эта игра стоит своих денег.

I've been apart of the BioShock franchise since the first one came out, I love this game. The gun play isn't even the main part of the game. the adventure and the art style is one of the main draws to the game and is easily my favorite part. Though, if you want an exciting first person shooter then you could also buy this game. Everything about this game is beautiful. The fighting is exhilarating and tense and the story is done very well. All of the abilities are incredibly helpful and not very hard to understand. Overall I think I would give this game a 9/10.

Ho appena finito questo titolo e posso ritenermi molto soddisfatto; la trama e la grafica (che anche per oggi, è davvero bella) sono probabilmente gli aspetti che più ho apprezzato durante la mia esperienza, tuttavia mi sento di dare un ulteriore nota di merito anche al coinvolgente combat-system adottato: infatti, nonostante si discosti dai primi due giochi della saga sotto questo punto di vista, mi sono divertito molto negli scenari di battaglia grazie ad un sistema movimentato e fluido; i vigor (ex plasmidi) però, purtroppo, sono stati (secondo me) un po' eclissati da armi veramente op (tra cui lo sniper e l'hand-cannon, miei due accompagnatori costanti nell'avventura) e quindi passati in secondo piano. Detto questo, dissento da tutti quelli che sminuiscono tanto il gioco  affermando che "non è all'altezza dei primi due" o "non merita il nome di Bioshock/non appartiene alla saga", in quanto, nonostante molte meccaniche siano state stravolte, ho rivisto in diverse occasioni elementi e situazioni già adottate nei precedenti. Riconosco inoltre al team dietro a questa memorabile saga, una capacità incredibile di creare atmosfera: in BioShock Infinite è MAGICA, e mentre nei primi era quasi tetra/claustrofobica (sempre restando particolare e accattivante), qua riesce a portarci in un luogo che è l'esatto opposto - totalmente aperto e spazioso. 
Lo consiglio davvero, dategli una chance.

The gameplay is a huge improvement from the first games, you never get bored of killing
the story sucks you in and the atmosphere is lovely, and the characters are very well written, especially your companion
she keeps you supplied all the time, gotta be the best companion out of the games i've ever played.
Solid entry to the franchise

When I first played this game as younger I found it absolutely fascinating but when I replayed it now I found it to be a bit better than decent. The graphics are great, the random old music and sounds are fantastic and I love the mysterious vibe. The combat is decent, not incredible but not bad either. The story is pretty incredible when you understand the ending. Pretty good cinematics and interesting characters. I'm not sure if its just because I played it for the second time that Im a bit let down by it, but a game worthy of trying if you like singleplayer story games. I should also mention that I like none of the other Bioshock games so this to me is someting very different. First time playthrough 7.5-8 / 10, now 6.5-7 / 10

13年的时候在《大众软件》上看到了关于该游戏的文章，当时给我的印象非常深刻，过了这么多年才去玩。游戏涉及了历史，音乐，宗教各方面内容，真的是很有艺术性。直到游戏结束，内心不舍，希望故事还能继续下去。
